creator: immanuel.hayden@gmail.com
text: Follow-up of 52026: It would be great if JMeter remembered the LaF set through the menu even after program restarts as it would enhance usability greatly :)
Note that the user.properties file can also be used for defining local overrides.
creator: sebb@apache.org
